name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications, leveraging a strong foundation in **.NET Core**, **React**, **Vue**, **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **SQL**. Demonstrated expertise in deploying **CI/CD** pipelines, **Agile** methodologies, and **DevOps** practices. Proficient in **Stripe Payments** integrations and utilizing **Infrastructure as Code** for seamless deployments. Skilled in **Containerization** technologies and experienced with **Monitoring Tools** and **Logging Tools** to ensure application reliability and performance.

In addition to expertise in frontend and backend frameworks like **React**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, I have a solid background in building AI/ML platforms enabling predictive analytics and automation. My technical proficiencies also extend to **MLOps** practices, including model training and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. I excel in compliance-driven development aligning with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, while also demonstrating strong problem-solving, analytical, communication, time management, and multitasking skills.
